text:
January 25, 1955
ZI
Mr* Jack K. Westbrook
Chairman, NAEB Acceptance Committee
Radio Station WUQT
University of Tennessee
Box 85^0
Knoxvillef Tennessee
Dear Mr* Westbrooki /
I listened to Dr. Urey’s Lecture, taped at the
University of Louisville. Th4 distinguished Dr. Urey
is probably more at home In. the laboratory than he
is on the speaker’s platfOrnu Nonetheless, I felt
there was enough material of real merit in his speech
to warrant network distribution. I for one, am
pleased that J)drcas Ruthenburg suggested to Dr. Skornia
that the Network Acceptance Committee vote on the
Louisville Lecture series. The group certainly is
a distinguished one and I think we’ll be all richer
for accepting the Entire series. I vote yes.
Sincerely,
Jim Slack
Manager, KUSD
JS/eg
c.c. to John Holt
